summary: Jewelry management system with karigar (artisan) mapping functionality that parses Excel files containing design codes, generic names, and karigar names
architectural_notes: Excel file format: Column A = Design Code, Column B = Generic Name, Column C = Karigar Name
Column headers are exact matches: 'Design Code', 'Generic Name', 'Karigar Name'
No header rows, empty rows, or special formatting in Excel files
known_issues: Karigar mapping Excel parser showing 561 validation errors (Design Code/Generic Name/Karigar Name required) despite data being present in file
Excel column mapping not recognizing data in columns A, B, and C correctly

existing_features.title: Fix the Excel parser in frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts to correctly read karigar mapping data from columns A (Design Code), B (Generic Name), and C (Karigar Name) with exact header matching
Add enhanced error logging to the karigar mapping Excel parser to show exactly what values are being read from each cell during parsing
Ensure the Excel parser handles both .xls and .xlsx file formats correctly for karigar mapping uploads

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Excel parsing for karigar mapping to correctly read Design Code (Column A), Generic Name (Column B), and Karigar Name (Column C)

projectName: Fix Excel parser to correctly read karigar mapping columns
